001package org.nasdanika.graph.processor;
002
003import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.FIELD;
004import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.METHOD;
005import static java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME;
006
007import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
008import java.lang.annotation.Target;
009
010/**
011 * Field or method to inject a matching incoming endpoint. A method shall have one or two parameters. 
012 * If a single parameter than the endpoint is passed to the method. If two parameters then the connection and endpoint are passed - it allows to use one method for more than one connection/endpoint.   
013 * @author Pavel
014 *
015 */
016@Retention(RUNTIME)
017@Target({FIELD, METHOD})
018public @interface IncomingEndpoint {
019        
020        /**
021         * If not blank, the value shall be a <a href="https://docs.spring.io/spring-framework/docs/5.3.22/reference/html/core.html#expressions">Spring boolean expression</a>
022         * which is evaluated in the context of the incoming connection. 
023         * @return
024         */
025        String value() default "";
026        
027        /**
028         * Matching priority. Defaults to 0. Higher priorities are matched before lower priorities.
029         * @return
030         */
031        int priority() default 0;
032                
033}
